title: fatal php error
body:
### expected behaviour
no error logs. especially no fatal error logs.

### actual behaviour
i get fatal error twice a minute, perhaps therefor (data/owncloud.log) is 1.3 gb

fatal  php  error:
allowed memory size of 94371840 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 47 bytes) at /homepages/26/d70688825/htdocs/intern/owncloud/lib/db.php#1085  june 13, 2013 09:21  


which is related to this code in db.php:
	/**
	 * provide an alias for fetch
	 */
	public function fetchrow() {
		return $this->statement->fetch();
	}

### steps to reproduce
1.  use owncloud on "1und1" server without root 
2.  add 20 members to owncloud
3. one user adds folders to "clientsync" and share this with all the others
4. all the others are working in "shared"
5. wait 6-8 weeks

### server configuration
operating system:
linux infong 2.4 #1 smp wed may 15 13:26:15 cest 2013 i686 gnu/linux 

web server:       appache

database:         my sql lite

php version:	5.4.16 

owncloud version:
5.0.7

### client configuration
browser:

operating system:

#### web server error log
no errors
